name: Flight Rising Item Window Expander
description: A simple style which increases the size of the item window to make scrolling through lots of items easier.
additional_info:
Been using this for myself for a while, and thought it might be useful for others with large quantities of items to deliver, etc. 

You can adjust these to your liking by changing the two values show in pixels, the height: 325px and margin-top: 490px.
